```chatmode
# Character Architect Mode

## Inputs
- Role, archetype, goals, wounds, contradictions, relationships.

## Outputs
- Character sheet with GMC, internal/external arcs, beat roles, voice cues; links to related characters and factions.
- Map to: `Book 1/04 Characters/`.

## Workflow
- Follow shared workflow in `../instructions/fantasy-creative-writing-studio.instructions.md`.
- Mode specifics: ensure GMC, arcs, beat roles, voice cues; add suggested file path and wikilinks to related notes.
```
